analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/11/0xdaef2a5d60878af62afe17ef42c1ef277f2b3c57.sol#450-454):
	External calls:
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/11/0xdaef2a5d60878af62afe17ef42c1ef277f2b3c57.sol)
	- token.transferOwnership(_newTokenOwner) (/unique_chucks/11/0xdaef2a5d60878af62afe17ef42c1ef277f2b3c57.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleClosed (/unique_chucks/11/0xdaef2a5d60878af62afe17ef42c1ef277f2b3c57.sol)

Crowdsale.externalPurchase (/unique_chucks/11/0xdaef2a5d60878af62afe17ef42c1ef277f2b3c57.sol#437-450) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_to,_tokens) (/unique_chucks/11/0xdaef2a5d60878af62afe17ef42c1ef277f2b3c57.sol#448)

Crowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/11/0xdaef2a5d60878af62afe17ef42c1ef277f2b3c57.sol#450-454) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/11/0xdaef2a5d60878af62afe17ef42c1ef277f2b3c57.sol)
